query.name: campaigns
query.sql: SELECT lea_key, cmp_title, cmp_id, cmp_alt_title, cmp_cpt_key, cmp_email, cmp_cpl, cmp_description, cmp_sp_outpulse_id, cmp_sp_outpulse_type, cmp_cpy_key FROM leads INNER JOIN campaigns ON lea_cmp_id = cmp_id

query.name: accounts
query.sql: SELECT act_assigned_usr, act_assigned_csr, act_add_date, act_modified_date, act_notes, act_external_agent, act_lead_primary_lead_key FROM Accounts inner join leads on leads.lea_account_id = act_key

query.name: leads
query.sql: SELECT lea_key, lea_add_date, lea_modified_date, lea_account_id, lea_last_call_date, lea_email_tracking_code, lea_tracking_information, lea_ip_address FROM leads

query.name: actions
query.sql: SELECT leads.lea_key, actions.act_key, actions.act_title, leads.lea_last_action_date FROM leads INNER JOIN actions ON leads.lea_last_action = actions.act_key

query.name: status0
query.sql: SELECT lea_key, sta_key, sta_title FROM leads INNER JOIN statuses ON lea_status = sta_key

query.name: individuals
query.sql: SELECT lea_key, indv_key, indv_first_name, indv_last_name, indv_smoking, indv_gender, indv_address2, indv_address1, indv_age, indv_city, indv_account_id, indv_add_user, indv_birthday, indv_add_date, indv_modified_user, indv_modified_date, indv_active_flag, indv_delete_flag, indv_day_phone, indv_evening_phone, indv_cell_phone, indv_fax_nmbr, indv_state_Id, indv_zipcode, indv_relation, indv_notes, indv_email, indv_external_reference_id FROM Individuals INNER JOIN leads ON indv_account_id = lea_account_id

query.name: status1
query.sql: SELECT lea_key, sta_key, sta_title FROM leads INNER JOIN statuses ON lea_sub_status = sta_key

query.name: assigned_user
query.sql: SELECT lea_key, usr_key, usr_first_name, usr_last_name FROM leads INNER JOIN Accounts ON lea_account_id = act_key INNER JOIN users ON act_assigned_usr = usr_key

query.name: assigned_csr
query.sql: SELECT lea_key, usr_key, usr_first_name, usr_last_name FROM leads INNER JOIN Accounts ON lea_account_id = act_key INNER JOIN users ON act_assigned_csr = usr_key

query.name: assigned_ta
query.sql: SELECT lea_key, usr_key, usr_first_name, usr_last_name FROM leads INNER JOIN Accounts ON lea_account_id = act_key INNER JOIN users ON act_transfer_user = usr_key

query.name: individuals
query.sql: SELECT L.lea_key, I.indv_key, I.indv_first_name, I.indv_last_name, I.indv_smoking, I.indv_gender, I.indv_address2, I.indv_address1, I.indv_age, I.indv_city, I.indv_account_id, I.indv_add_user, I.indv_birthday, I.indv_add_date, I.indv_modified_user, I.indv_modified_date, I.indv_active_flag, I.indv_delete_flag, I.indv_day_phone, I.indv_evening_phone, I.indv_cell_phone, I.indv_fax_nmbr, I.indv_state_Id, I.indv_zipcode, I.indv_relation, I.indv_notes, I.indv_email, I.indv_external_reference_id FROM leads AS L INNER JOIN Accounts ON L.lea_account_id = Accounts.act_key INNER JOIN Individuals AS I ON Accounts.act_primary_individual_id = I.indv_key

query.name: individuals
query.sql: SELECT L.lea_key, I.indv_key, I.indv_first_name, I.indv_last_name, I.indv_smoking, I.indv_gender, I.indv_address2, I.indv_address1, I.indv_age, I.indv_city, I.indv_account_id, I.indv_add_user, I.indv_birthday, I.indv_add_date, I.indv_modified_user, I.indv_modified_date, I.indv_active_flag, I.indv_delete_flag, I.indv_day_phone, I.indv_evening_phone, I.indv_cell_phone, I.indv_fax_nmbr, I.indv_state_Id, I.indv_zipcode, I.indv_relation, I.indv_notes, I.indv_email, I.indv_external_reference_id FROM leads AS L INNER JOIN Accounts ON L.lea_account_id = Accounts.act_key INNER JOIN Individuals AS I ON Accounts.act_secondary_individual_id = I.indv_key
